SEARCH
Module makao
Package makao.model.game

Class StateOfRound

java.lang.Object
makao.model.game.StateOfRound
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class StateOfRound extends Object implements Serializable
The StateOfRound class is responsible for keeping track of all the information related to the state of the current round.
See Also:
